docs.snippet: Pakistan's failure to take 20 wickets in all three tests was responsible for their series loss in Australia and the situation will not improve unless players get more exposure to conditions Down Under, captain Misbah-ul-Haq said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pakistan's failure to take 20 wickets in all three tests was responsible for their series loss in Australia and the situation will not improve unless players get more exposure to conditions Down Under, captain Misbah-ul-Haq said on Saturday.

headline.main: Misbah Bemoans Bowling Flaws in Pakistan's Series Loss
headline.print_headline: Misbah Bemoans Bowling Flaws in Pakistan's Series Loss

docs.snippet: Rarely did Stephen Curry, coach Steve Kerr and the rest of those 73-win Warriors have to stop and re-evaluate things last season. Until they lost the NBA championship to LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers, of course....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rarely did Stephen Curry, coach Steve Kerr and the rest of those 73-win Warriors have to stop and re-evaluate things last season. Until they lost the NBA championship to LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers, of course.

headline.main: Grizzlies Rally From 24 Down to Stun Warriors 128-119 in OT
headline.print_headline: Grizzlies Rally From 24 Down to Stun Warriors 128-119 in OT

docs.snippet: Rogue soldiers allowed Ivory Coast's defence minister and dozens of others to leave a house where they had been trapped on Saturday when some mutineers appeared to reject aspects of a deal intended to end a two-day revolt, a Reuters witness said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rogue soldiers allowed Ivory Coast's defence minister and dozens of others to leave a house where they had been trapped on Saturday when some mutineers appeared to reject aspects of a deal intended to end a two-day revolt, a Reuters witness said.

headline.main: Ivory Coast Defence Minister, Others Freed by Mutinying Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast Defence Minister, Others Freed by Mutinying Soldiers

docs.snippet: Uncapped middle-order batsman Chris Lynn was rewarded for his Big Bash League (BBL) pyrotechnics with a place in the Australia squad for the five match one-day international series against Pakistan on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Uncapped middle-order batsman Chris Lynn was rewarded for his Big Bash League (BBL) pyrotechnics with a place in the Australia squad for the five match one-day international series against Pakistan on Saturday.

headline.main: Lynn Rewarded for Big Bash Form With Australia Call-Up
headline.print_headline: Lynn Rewarded for Big Bash Form With Australia Call-Up
